diagram_logic_form: The measure of angle $CDA$ is $x$ degrees.
The length of the line $AC$ is $24$ units.
The length of the line $AD$ is $36$ units.
The measure of angle $BAC$ is $y$ degrees.
Point $B$ lies on the line connecting $C$ and $D$.
The line $BC$ is perpendicular to the line $AC$.
The length of the line $BD$ is equal to the length of the line $BC$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, $AD$, forming a triangle $ABC$.
There are lines $BC$, $BD$, $CD$, forming a triangle $BCD$.
